'''Patina Anavatlaca''' is [[Citlali]]'s [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay==
{{Constellation Table|Citlali}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Patina'' is a Latin word referring to a shallow, concave vessel such as a shallow dish or pan.
* ''Anavatlaca'' is a compound made up of the word "anavatl" and the Latin suffix "-acus."
** ''Anavatl'' is a Latinized spelling of the Nahuatl word "anahuatl," a round disc-shaped pendant associated with the Aztec deity {{w|Tezcatlipoca}}, whose name means "smoking mirror" and alludes to obsidian mirrors.
** The suffix "-acus" is suffixed to nouns to create adjectives. Thus, when modifying "patina," a feminine word, the suffix becomes "-aca."
